entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
